ELEMENT.TITLE: Single column product list with quantity/add to carts (wholesale)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: A layout designed for wholesale stores. It allows shoppers to purchase directly from the category page. Since the product list has a form, multipage is disabled and no sorting is present. works best with 2011+ themes
